bertramka.Interesting facts: Cultural monument, classical music concerts, social events, W. A. ​​Mozart Museum
bertramka.Parking: YES, in the underground parking of OC Smíchov
bertramka.Operator: Městská část Praha 5 a spol. Comenius

frantiskanska-zahrada.Interesting facts: Pleasant sitting in the city center, suitable for children and seniors, dogs NO, in the neighborhood of the Church of Our Lady of the Snows
frantiskanska-zahrada.Public transport: Václavské náměstí Tram. No. 3, 9, 14, 24, 51, 52, 54, 55, 56, 58, metro A, B Můstek
frantiskanska-zahrada.Road surface: Paving, a special surface in the children's corner
frantiskanska-zahrada.Opening hours: All year round, closing at night

obora-hvezda.WC: Mobile cells in the field, during the season April to October also WC in the summer house
obora-hvezda.Attractions: Suitable for families with children and tourists, dogs yes, memorial trees, nature trail, nature attractions.
obora-hvezda.Bike paths: Possibility of cycling on footpaths, cross-country skiing in winter
obora-hvezda.Sports field: NO, behind the field of children's and traffic playgrounds and the House of Children and Youth Vypich www.ddmp6.cz/kontakt/
obora-hvezda.Public transport: Nad Markétou, bus no. 179, 184, 191, 510, Libocká - bus no. 179, 510, Vypich, tram no. 15, 22, 25, 57
obora-hvezda.Parking: Approx. 8 places in front of the Libocká Gate, or freely in U Hvězdy Street
obora-hvezda.Operator: Památník národního písemnictví a Hlavní město Praha
obora-hvezda.Opening hours: Year-round game park, summer house April 10-17, May to September 10 am - 6 pm, October 10 am - 5 pm

kampa.Interesting facts: View of the Vltava, Sovovy Mlýny Gallery, Čertovka, Charles Bridge, Werich House, memorial trees
kampa.Sports field: NO, possibility to move on grass surfaces
kampa.Playground: YES in the vicinity of the Kampa Community and Mother Center

kinskeho-zahrada.Interesting facts: A pleasant place for walks with children, a quiet zone in the middle of the city, a museum, ornamental lakes, a natural attraction - Petrin Rocks
kinskeho-zahrada.Playground: YES, at the entrance from Kinský Square, near the Kinský Summer Palace, another under construction
kinskeho-zahrada.Parking: YES, in the underground parking of OC Smíchov

klamovka.Interesting facts: Historical attractions, art gallery, music club and garden restaurant, playground for the little ones, dogs YES
klamovka.Sports field: tennis courts and sports grounds in the falconry

ladronka.Interesting facts: Extensive leisure area, suitable for all ages, dogs YES, the possibility of a full-day stay, music and entertainment events throughout the year.
ladronka.Skating: YES - new surfaces and marked routes for in-line skaters
ladronka.Sports field: NO, behind the field of children's and traffic playgrounds and the House of Children and Youth Vypich www.ddmp6.cz/kontakt/
ladronka.Playground: YES at the restaurant, older playground in the back behind the bus stop Ladronka
ladronka.Public transport: U Ladronky, Rozýnova, Štefkova BUS No. 191, Vypich BUS No. 108, 174, 180, 191, I3, tram No. 15, 22, 25, 57
ladronka.Parking: YES, at Tomanova and Skokanská streets
ladronka.Road surface: Asphalt in combination with paving and hammer treatment

letna.Interesting facts: Extensive leisure area, suitable for all ages, dogs YES, possibility of all-day stay, cultural events during the year
letna.Playground: YES, a total of 4, at the building Letenský zámeček, 2 x in the vicinity of tennis courts, at the Hanavský pavilion
letna.Public transport: Letenské náměstí and Sparta tram no. 1, 8, 15, 25, 26, 51, 56, Čechův most tram no. 12, 17, 53, Chotkovy sady tram no. 18, 20, 57, metro Hradčanská

petrin.WC: In the adjacent restaurants and by the lookout tower
petrin.Attractions: suitable for families with children and tourists, possibly on foot or by cable car, lookout tower, maze, observatory, underground galleries, fruit orchards
petrin.Public transport: Újezd ​​tram no. 6, 9, 12, 20, 22, 23, 57, 58, 59, Hellichova tram no. 12, 20, 22, 23, 57, Pohořelec tram no. 22, 23, Dormitories Strahov BUS No. 143, 149, 217
petrin.Opening hours: Year-round free access to Petřín, year-round Štefánik Observatory, lookout tower January, February, March, November, December 10 am - 6 pm, April, September, October 10 am - 7 pm, May to August 10 am - 10 pm

riegrovy-sady.WC: YES in the restaurant and mobile on the playground
riegrovy-sady.Interesting facts: Classicist lookout tower from the 1920s - after the reconstruction of the restaurant, a three-sided obelisk from about 1840, a view of Prague, dogs YES
riegrovy-sady.Public transport: Metro Jiřího z Poděbrad, Na Smetance Bus no. 135, Italská and Vinohradská tržnice tram no. 11

stromovka.Attractions: For families with children and tourists, possible walk to the ZOO and Botanical Gardens, dogs yes, natural attractions, Planetarium, Exhibition Grounds
stromovka.Sports field: In the neighborhood of TK Sparta Prague - tennis courts
stromovka.Public transport: Výstaviště, tram no. 5, 12, 14, 15, 17, 53, 54, Sibiřské nám., Bus no. 131, by steamer from Rašínov nábř.
stromovka.Parking: Next to the Exhibition Grounds or in Bubeneč

vysehrad.Interesting facts: National cultural monument with historical value, area suitable for walks and sightseeing and for a family trip with children, interesting views of Prague, museum, cemetery of famous personalities Slavín
vysehrad.Playground: YES - at the rotunda of St. Martin, Mr. Trnka's corner, in front of the entrance to the Gorlice hall
vysehrad.Public transport: Vyšehrad - metro C, Podolská vodárna tram no. 3, 16, 17, 21, 52
vysehrad.Parking: YES, in the underground car park of the Congress Center, or at Na Topolce Street
